item.description: Gate Ventures has announced a strategic investment of $8.5 million in the BugsCoin ecosystem. item.title: Hackers Exploit Zero-Day in cnPilot Routers to Deploy AIRASHI DDoS Botnet
item.description:
Threat actors are exploiting an unspecified zero-day vulnerability in Cambium Networks cnPilot routers to deploy a variant of the AISURU botnet called AIRASHI to carry out distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks.
According to QiAnXin XLab, the attacks have leveraged the security flaw since June 2024. Additional details about the shortcomings have been withheld to prevent further abuse.

item.title: Linux's KUnit Will Now Default To Using Hardware Acceleration For Faster Testing
item.description: Surprisingly a change not made years ago, the Linux Kernel Unit Testing "KUnit" framework with the Linux 6.14 kernel is set to use hardware acceleration by default for faster testing where available...
